pr_title: Memoize ATN visit states to avoid exponential backtracking

timeline.bodyText: Maybe use an immutable set here so that it's clear we aren't modifying it later
timeline.author: electrum
electrum

replies.bodyText: I had it like that because it's easier to copy and use in the CLI, or elsewhere than having to write a program to generate the query programmatically.
replies.author: martint
